title: Heaven's Raign: The Sha-Li
description: Part II of the Heaven's Raign Series. The saying goes the child (in this case daughter) will have to pay for the sins of the father. Everyday Raignai (Rain) deals with just that, it is her gift and her curse. After defeating Phil and Legion in book I Rain must now fulfill a promise and retrieve an object stolen by the ghost-like Sha-Li which is only the beginning of her adventure. Haunted by her demons and hunted by the same Rain is not your stereotypical female. She does not need our saving. In fact you might need hers. Along with her team who are more than family Rain must step into the unknown and see what the Sha-Li have in store for her.
author: Derrick Marrow
